Hexxagon.Controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TController
      • Hexxagon.Controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameController, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, IController

    public class GameController
extends TController
implements IGameController
    It is the controller object of the Hexxagon module.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

                                          int rowIndex)
                                   throws TError

                                               int rowIndex,
                                               byte playerIndex)
                                        throws TError
        Forces all play board visual components to display animation when a cell is occupied.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - Column index of occupied cell. Index should valid and existing otherwise TError is thrown.
        rowIndex - Row index of occupied cell. Index should valid and existing otherwise TError is thrown.
        playerIndex - Unique index of player by whom the cell is occupied.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • cellClicked

        public final void cellClicked(int clickedColumnIndex,
                              int clickedRowIndex)
                       throws TError
        Informs the controller module about that a cell was clicked by a human player. This method is used only by the human player.
        Specified by:
        cellClicked in interface IGameController
        Parameters:
        clickedColumnIndex - Column index of the cell clicked. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        clickedRowIndex - Row index of the cell clicked. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • autoPlayerCellStep

        public final void autoPlayerCellStep(int fromColumnIndex,
                                     int fromRowIndex,
                                     int targetColumnIndex,
                                     int targetRowIndex,
                                     byte playerIndex)
                              throws TError
        Informs the controller module about a step from a position to another one. This method is used only by artificial player.
        Specified by:
        autoPlayerCellStep in interface IGameController
        Parameters:
        fromColumnIndex - Column index of the cell from where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        fromRowIndex - Row index of the cell from where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        targetColumnIndex - Column index of the cell to where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        targetRowIndex - Row index of the cell to where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        playerIndex - The unique index of player. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • chooseAttackerCell

        private void chooseAttackerCell(int columnIndex,
                                int rowIndex,
                                byte playerIndex)
                         throws TError
        Entitles a cell to be base cell of the following attack.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - Column index of specified cell.
        rowIndex - Row index of specified cell.
        playerIndex - The unique index of player clicked on cell.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • tryToCaptureTheTarget

        private boolean tryToCaptureTheTarget(int baseColumnIndex,
                                      int baseRowIndex,
                                      int targetColumnIndex,
                                      int targetRowIndex,
                                      byte attackerPlayerIndex)
                               throws TError
        Tries to capture the target cell and its area from the base cell.
        Parameters:
        baseColumnIndex - The column index of the source cell.
        baseRowIndex - The row index of the source cell.
        targetColumnIndex - The column index of the target cell.
        targetRowIndex - The row index of the target cell.
        attackerPlayerIndex - Unique index of player attacking.
        Returns:
        True if the attempt of capture was successful otherwise false.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • isInTheAttackRange

        private boolean isInTheAttackRange(int baseColumnIndex,
                                   int baseRowIndex,
                                   int targetColumnIndex,
                                   int targetRowIndex)
        Tells whether the targeted cell is in the attack range counted from the base cell.
        Parameters:
        baseColumnIndex - The column index of the base cell.
        baseRowIndex - The row index of the base cell.
        targetColumnIndex - The column index of the target cell.
        targetRowIndex - The row index of the target cell.
        Returns:
        True if the target cell is in the attack range, false otherwise.

      • isInTheFissionZone

        private boolean isInTheFissionZone(int baseColumnIndex,
                                   int baseRowIndex,
                                   int targetColumnIndex,
                                   int targetRowIndex)
        Tells whether the target cell is in the fission zone.
        Parameters:
        baseColumnIndex - The column index of the source cell.
        baseRowIndex - The row index of the source cell.
        targetColumnIndex - The column index of the target cell.
        targetRowIndex - The row index of the target cell.
        Returns:
        True if the target cell is in the fission zone otherwise false.

        baseRowIndex - The row index of the source cell.
        targetColumnIndex - The column index of the source cell.
        targetRowIndex - The row index of the source cell.

      • pauseGame

        public final void pauseGame()
                     throws TError
        Interrupts the game. If invoked in inappropriate game state than TError is thrown.
        Specified by:
        pauseGame in interface IGameController
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • continueGame

        public void continueGame()
                  throws TError
        Allows to continue the game. If invoked in inappropriate game state than TError is thrown.
        Specified by:
        continueGame in interface IGameController
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • stopGame

        public final void stopGame()
                    throws TError

        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • isGameRunning

        public boolean isGameRunning()
        Tells whether the game is active. If a game is not active than no human or artificial player can invoke events.
        Specified by:
        isGameRunning in interface IGameController
        Returns:
        True if the game is running otherwise false.

      • getGameData

        public IGameData getGameData()

      • setGameData

        public void setGameData(IGameData gameData)
                 throws TError
        Sets the data component of the game. Only one data component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Specified by:
        setGameData in interface IGameController
        Parameters:
        gameData - An object instance of class implementing IGameData interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addPlayBoard

        public void addPlayBoard(IPlayBoard playBoard)
                  throws TError
        Adds a play board visual component to the controller. Play board is the visual interface on which the balls are placed. More than one play board component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Specified by:
        addPlayBoard in interface IGameController
        Parameters:
        playBoard - An object instance of class implementing IPlayBoard interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addInfoBoard

        public void addInfoBoard(IInfoBoard infoBoard)
                  throws TError
        Adds a info board visual component to the controller. Info board is the visual interface on which the actual points of players are presented. More than one info board component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Specified by:
        addInfoBoard in interface IGameController
        Parameters:
        infoBoard - An object instance of class implementing IInfoBoard interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addFaceBoard

        public void addFaceBoard(IFaceBoard faceBoard)
                  throws TError
        Adds a face board visual component to the controller. Face board is the visual interface on which the artificial player is presented. More than one info board component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Specified by:
        addFaceBoard in interface IGameController
        Parameters:
        faceBoard - An object instance of class implementing IFaceBoard interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
